name: Mellow Fly UTOC-1
description: USB to CAN adapter with single CAN output, based on STM32F072
setup_instructions: 1. Connect UTOC-1 to Pi via USB
2. Flash with CAN bridge firmware if not pre-flashed
4. Reboot or run: sudo ip link set can0 up type can bitrate 1000000
5. Check with: ip -s link show can0
notes: Single CAN output - suitable for one toolboard
Ensure 120 ohm termination at each end of CAN bus
Default firmware may use 500000 bitrate - check your toolboard settings
